DtScriptedTaskMetaData.myDescription: Crowd moves to gather in front of and observe an entity of interest.

myVariables.item: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="4"> <myVariableName>objectOfInterest</myVariableName> <myType>simulationobject</myType> <myLabel>Object Of Interest</myLabel> <myToolTip>The object to crowd in front of</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue></myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData>DtAllEntitiesFilter;required</myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> <myScriptedTaskVariableName></myScriptedTaskVariableName> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="4"> <myVariableName>idleTask</myVariableName> <myType>string</myType> <myLabel>Idle Task</myLabel> <myToolTip>The task which will be given to each pedestrian when they arrive</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue></myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>0</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> <myScriptedTaskVariableName></myScriptedTaskVariableName> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="4"> <myVariableName>speedMultiplier</myVariableName> <myType>double</myType> <myLabel>Speed Multiplier</myLabel> <myToolTip>Chosen speed for each entity is multiplied by this value. Used to slow down or speed up entities.</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>1</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-0</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>0</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> <myScriptedTaskVariableName></myScriptedTaskVariableName> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>
